name: Survey of screenshot-based CSS testing tools
visualregressiontesting.com
description: Basic collection of links.

name: Selenium
description: Browser automation framework and ecosystem.

name: SlimerJS
description: Scriptable browser like PhantomJS, based on Firefox.

name: trifleJS
description: Headless automation for Internet Explorer.

name: CasperJS
description: Navigation scripting and testing utility for PhantomJS and SlimerJS.

name: Webdriver.io
description: Node.js bindings implementation for the W3C WebDriver protocol.

name: Navalia
description: Browser Automation based on headless Chrome and GraphQL.

name: Chromeless
description: Chrome automation made simple. Runs locally or headless on AWS Lambda.

name: Cypress.io
description: An automation framework that runs in-browser.

name: PhantomJS
description: Scriptable Headless WebKit.

name: Wraith
description: Easy to use ruby tool with docker support.

name: BackstopJS
description: Config-driven automated screenshot test framework.

name: Galen
description: Java framework based on Selenium.

name: Gemini
description: Feature rich framework with support for Selenium and  CasperJS.

name: Huxlay
description: Python framework based on Selenium Webdriver.

name: PhantomFlow
description: Experimental approach to UI testing, based on Decision Trees.

name: CSSCritic
description: Lightweight CSS regression testing.

name: Spectre
description: Provides image comparison capabilities and an admin interface for managing screenshots.

name: Shoov
description: UI regression and functional testing focused on Drupal 7 sites.

name: OcularJS
description: uses PhantomJS.

name: WebdriverCSS
description: WebdriverCSS sits on top of Webdriver.io and hooks into Selenium.

name: Look-alike
description: Chrome Extension for taking and comparing screenshots.

name: Hardy
description: Selenium-driven, cucumber-powered CSS testing.

name: TestCafe
description: Automated browser testing for the modern web development stack.

name: Needle
description: Needle is a tool for testing visuals with Selenium and nose (Python).

name: dpxdt [Depicted]
description: End-to-end testing with Python.

name: gatling
description: Integrated visual RSpec matcher which makes real visual testing easy (Ruby).

name: grunt-photobox
description: Plugin to prevent your project of broken layout via screenshot photo sessions of your site.

name: vrtest
description: JavaScript library for running visual regression tests on your components cross browser via selenium.

name: Happo
description: Visual diffing in CI for user interfaces.

name: reg-cli
description: Visual regression test tool which output easy-to-read single file html repot.

name: Nightmare
description: High-level browser automation library based on Electron.

name: Puppeteer
description: Headless Google Chrome Node API.

name: Visual Review
description: A human-friendly tool for testing and reviewing visual regressions.

name: reg-suit
description: Visual regression testing suite which compares images, stores snapshots, and notifies the difference to your GitHub repo.

name: Chimp
description: Develop acceptance tests & end-to-end tests with realtime feedback.

name: Differencify
description: A library for visual regression testing using Puppeteer.

name: ResembleJS
description: Analyse and compare images with Javascript and HTML5.

name: Muppeteer
description: Visual regression testing framework for Chrome using Mocha and Puppeteer.

name: ember-visual-test
description: Simple visual regression testing for Ember.

name: AET
description: Scalable testing tool providing visual regression testing, accessibility and performance validation, markup analysis and more.

name: Wendigo
description: Test-oriented browser automation library based on Puppeteer.

name: BrowserStack
description: Free for Open Source. Supports Selenium Webdriver.

name: screener.io
description: For React, looks open source.

name: applitools
description: Cloud base visual tests.

name: percy.io
description: Continuous visual reviews for web apps.

name: screenster.io
description: Cloud based automation testing platform for web and mobile UI.

name: MogoTest
description: Website Browser Testing Tool For SEO Experts.

name: browserling
description: LIVE interactive cross-browser testing.

name: Browser Shots
description: Screenshots only.

name: Ghost Inspector
description: See introduction video.

name: CrossBrowserTesting
description: Manual & exploratory testing on 1500+ real browsers and mobile devices.

name: Argos-CI
description: Automate visual regression testing.

name: BackTrac
description: Cloud based visual regression tool. Uses headless firefox and proprietary comparison algorithm (detect layout shifts).

name: Chromatic
description: Visual testing and UI review for component libraries. Cloud-based. Video

name: VisWiz.io
description: Flexible visual regression testing service.

description: Compares: Wraith, PhantomCSS, Gemini, WebdriverCSS and Spectre.

description: Screencast with code demo and best practices.

description: from a tool to a process by Nikhil Verma - How the Mobile Web team in Badoo converted and integrated PhantomCSS into their workflow and connected it to their CI process.

name: DalekJS
